trends: There have been no other sightings in Hawley
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Flaming ball zig zagged above Lake Wallenpaupack after fireworks.
divs: Sighting DetailsRoughly 15 minutes after the fireworks ended to the right of Wallenpaupack highschool. A flaming ball was seen in the sky by several witnesses. It moved right and left for roughly 10 minutes then shot up and disappeared.
